com.riskgame.service.Impl

Class RiskPlayImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.service.Impl.RiskPlayImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiskPlayInterface

    @Service
public class RiskPlayImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RiskPlayInterface
    This is a implementation class of RiskPlayInterface where all buisness logic of game playing screen is writeen.
    Author:
    Zankhanaben Patel, Koshaben Patel
    See Also:
    RiskMap, Player, com.riskgame.model.PlayerTerritory
